div.div: Adaptive capacity map for the case study country: Vietnam.
div.p: The respective indicators (Poverty, Health, Infrastructure….) are displayed in 3 classes (low, medium, high) based on the natural breaks (jenks) classification using ArcMap 10.1. Overall AC Index is displayed as low (0.535–0.661), medium (0.662–0.771) and high (0.772–1) corresponding to the bottom, middle and highest third when administrative areas are ranked from lowest to highest AC.
